--- layout: datasheet ---

TrafficGuard Probe Instrument

Overview

TrafficGuard Probe performs the asset gathering and connection tracking functionality for TrafficGuard. The information gathered is relayed to TrafficGuard Manager instrument which can be used to view the collected information.

TrafficGuard Probe Instrument needs mirror-bridge interface, traffic in this interface is inspected and TrafficGuard Probe gathers information about active devices visible on the network.

TrafficGuard Probe instrument properties

Instrument developer F-Solutions Oy
Categories Integrity Monitoring, Asset Tracking
Network access type Passive
Required interfaces The interface tgprobe gathers asset information from (mirror-bridge with receive capabilities)
Instrument dependencies None
Related Instruments TrafficGuard Management
Data retention TrafficGuard Probe does not store data localy
Management UI No
Performance TrafficGuard Probe is able to hanldle XXmbits/sec with standadrd F-Probe hardware
